name: Smith & Nephew plc
description: Smith & Nephew plc is a global medical technology company dedicated to helping healthcare professionals improve patients' lives. Founded in 1856 and headquartered in London, England, Smith & Nephew operates in over 100 countries and is renowned for its innovative solutions in surgical devices, advanced wound management, and orthopaedics. The company focuses on developing products that enhance surgical performance and improve patient outcomes. Its main product lines include advanced wound care solutions, surgical instruments for minimally invasive procedures, and orthopaedic reconstruction products. Smith & Nephew emphasizes a commitment to sustainability and corporate responsibility, seeking to minimize its environmental impact while advancing healthcare technology. With a strong pipeline of new products and a focus on research and development, Smith & Nephew is well-positioned to address the evolving needs of the global healthcare market and enhance the quality of care delivered to patients worldwide.
